actions.text: Measure failed of passage under suspension of rules in House, roll call #356 (207-140).

official_title: Resolved, that in conducting hearings held pursuant to House Resolution 803, 93d Congress, the Committee on the Judiciary is authorized to proceed without regard to the second sentence of clause 27(f)(4) of rule XI of the rules of the House.

summary.text: Authorizes the House Committee on the Judiciary in conducting hearings held pursuant to H. Res. 803, 93rd Congress pertaining to the impeachment investigation of the President to disregard the House Rules entitling minority Members of a committee upon request by a majority of those minority members to call witnesses to testify.

titles.title: Resolved, that in conducting hearings held pursuant to House Resolution 803, 93d Congress, the Committee on the Judiciary is authorized to proceed without regard to the second sentence of clause 27(f)(4) of rule XI of the rules of the House.
